str2: Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of theaomai; to be a spectator of, i.e. Discern, (experience) or intensively (acknowledge).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
No longer, no more. Also ouk eti from ou and eti; not yet, no longer.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
